text: Thank you <@U039PUBV59N>, appreciate the reply. I did install the HubSpot/cli and it's the latest already. I used the cms-webpack-serverless-boilerplate and just followed the instruction in the readme. But error "Cannot find module '@HubSpot/cms-cli/lib/prompts'" persist. I looked at the HubSpot in the node_modules folder and it is really not there. Not sure why it's looking at this prompt. I didn't even update the files. I'm running in vscode in windows by the way.
Thank you <@U04GB26K4P7>. I will look at it and will try to use it. I am new to all of these, so thank you all for the advice! :woman-bowing:
